instruction: Create a recipe containing at least 3 ingredients.
output:
This recipe contains three ingredients and is perfect for a quick and easy snack. 
Ingredients: 1 cup of popcorn kernels, 2 tablespoons of melted butter, and 1 teaspoon of dried oregano. 
Method: Place the popcorn kernels into a medium-sized pot and heat over medium-high heat. Cover the pan and shake it occasionally until the popcorn is mostly popped. Melt the butter in a bowl and stir in the dried oregano. Pour the butter over the popcorn, stirring to coat all of the popcorn evenly. Serve warm and enjoy!
